question: Stanley Greene, an award-winning photojournalist passed away. He hailed from which country?
explanation: Stanley Greene (52), an award-winning American photographer of conflict, disasters and humanitarian crises across the globe, has recently passed away in Paris, France. He was best known for his documentation of the conflict in Chechnya, between rebels and the Russian Armed Forces, which was compiled in his 2004 book “Open Wound”. Greene was recognised in the World Press Photo awards, in 1994, 2001, 2004 and 2008.
